pullrequest.title: Adding xacro parameter to specify task name in plugin

content.raw: I can certainly see that point of view.  Neither solution is ideal.  Rather than change the API and have differences \(albeit small\) between Phase 2 and Phase 3, I recommend we stick with the typo - the Dock task uses the Task Msg name = `scan`\).  So far my sense is that teams have been able to deal with that so far.
content.html: I can certainly see that point of view. Neither solution is ideal. Rather than change the API and have differences (albeit small) between Phase 2 and Phase 3, I recommend we stick with the typo - the Dock task uses the Task Msg name = scan). So far my sense is that teams have been able to deal with that so far.
